sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a trapezium.
message_1: A trapezium has two parallel sides measuring 10 cm and 15 cm, respectively. The other two sides are 6 cm and 8 cm. Find the perimeter of the trapezium.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of the trapezium, we simply need to add the lengths of all four sides together.

Perimeter = Side1 + Side2 + Side3 + Side4
Perimeter = 10 cm + 15 cm + 6 cm + 8 cm
Perimeter = 39 cm

The perimeter of the trapezium is 39 cm.
